trans-unit.source: Get Blob Properties
trans-unit.target: Get Blob Properties

trans-unit.source: Get Blob Properties
trans-unit.target: Get Blob Properties

trans-unit.source: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Get Blob Properties</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation returns all user-defined metadata, standard HTTP properties, and system properties for the blob.
trans-unit.target: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Get Blob Properties</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation returns all user-defined metadata, standard HTTP properties, and system properties for the blob.

trans-unit.source: It does not return the content of the blob.
trans-unit.target: It does not return the content of the blob.

trans-unit.source: Request
trans-unit.target: Request

trans-unit.source: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Get Blob Properties</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> request may be constructed as follows.
trans-unit.target: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Get Blob Properties</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> request may be constructed as follows.

trans-unit.source: HTTPS is recommended.
trans-unit.target: HTTPS is recommended.

trans-unit.source: Replace <placeholder>myaccount</placeholder> with the name of your storage account:
trans-unit.target: Replace <placeholder>myaccount</placeholder> with the name of your storage account:

trans-unit.source: HEAD Method Request URI
trans-unit.target: HEAD Method Request URI

trans-unit.source: HTTP Version
trans-unit.target: HTTP Version

trans-unit.source: HTTP/1.1
trans-unit.target: HTTP/1.1

trans-unit.source: Emulated Storage Service URI
trans-unit.target: Emulated Storage Service URI

trans-unit.source: When making a request against the emulated storage service, specify the emulator hostname and Blob service port as <codeInline>127.0.0.1:10000</codeInline>, followed by the emulated storage account name:
trans-unit.target: When making a request against the emulated storage service, specify the emulator hostname and Blob service port as <codeInline>127.0.0.1:10000</codeInline>, followed by the emulated storage account name:

trans-unit.source: HEAD Method Request URI
trans-unit.target: HEAD Method Request URI

trans-unit.source: HTTP Version
trans-unit.target: HTTP Version

trans-unit.source: HTTP/1.1
trans-unit.target: HTTP/1.1

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <legacyLink xlink:href="f0e3acde-f019-4148-9544-34cf2ff27211" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Using the Azure Storage Emulator for Development and Testing</legacyLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <legacyLink xlink:href="f0e3acde-f019-4148-9544-34cf2ff27211" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Using the Azure Storage Emulator for Development and Testing</legacyLink>.

trans-unit.source: URI Parameters
trans-unit.target: URI Parameters

trans-unit.source: The following additional parameters may be specified on the request URI.
trans-unit.target: The following additional parameters may be specified on the request URI.

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: Parameter

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: The snapshot parameter is an opaque <languageKeyword>DateTime</languageKeyword> value that, when present, specifies the blob snapshot to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: The snapshot parameter is an opaque <languageKeyword>DateTime</languageKeyword> value that, when present, specifies the blob snapshot to retrieve.

trans-unit.source: For more information on working with blob snapshots, see <link xlink:href="5614e5d3-58cb-42ee-9db6-d90de86196cd" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Working with Snapshots.</link>
trans-unit.target: For more information on working with blob snapshots, see <link xlink:href="5614e5d3-58cb-42ee-9db6-d90de86196cd" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Working with Snapshots.</link>

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: The <parameterReference>timeout</parameterReference> parameter is expressed in seconds.
trans-unit.target: The <parameterReference>timeout</parameterReference> parameter is expressed in seconds.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="9ae411fa-1495-42a0-bc26-c41ebca9d5b8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Setting Timeouts for Blob Service Operations</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="9ae411fa-1495-42a0-bc26-c41ebca9d5b8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Setting Timeouts for Blob Service Operations</link>.

trans-unit.source: Request Headers
trans-unit.target: Request Headers

trans-unit.source: The following table describes required and optional request headers.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes required and optional request headers.

trans-unit.source: Request Header
trans-unit.target: Request Header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the authentication scheme, account name, and signature.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the authentication scheme, account name, and signature.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="96cec7bc-63cc-4227-920a-dddd850433c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authentication Schemes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="96cec7bc-63cc-4227-920a-dddd850433c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authentication Schemes</link>.

trans-unit.source: <parameterReference>Date</parameterReference> or <parameterReference>x-ms-date</parameterReference>
trans-unit.target: <parameterReference>Date</parameterReference> or <parameterReference>x-ms-date</parameterReference>

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) for the request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) for the request.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="96cec7bc-63cc-4227-920a-dddd850433c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authentication Schemes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="96cec7bc-63cc-4227-920a-dddd850433c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authentication Schemes</link>.

trans-unit.source: Required for all authenticated requests, optional for anonymous requests.
trans-unit.target: Required for all authenticated requests, optional for anonymous requests.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="cc4fba5c-7015-40bf-a29c-b6f0c684ff3c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Storage Service Versioning</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="cc4fba5c-7015-40bf-a29c-b6f0c684ff3c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Storage Service Versioning</link>.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: If this header is specified, the <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Get Blob Properties</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation will be performed only if both of the following conditions are met:
trans-unit.target: If this header is specified, the <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Get Blob Properties</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation will be performed only if both of the following conditions are met:

trans-unit.source: The blob's lease is currently active.
trans-unit.target: The blob's lease is currently active.

trans-unit.source: The lease ID specified in the request matches that of the blob.
trans-unit.target: The lease ID specified in the request matches that of the blob.

trans-unit.source: If both of these conditions are not met, the request will fail and the <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Get Blob Properties</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation will fail with status code 412 (Precondition Failed).
trans-unit.target: If both of these conditions are not met, the request will fail and the <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Get Blob Properties</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation will fail with status code 412 (Precondition Failed).

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Provides a client-generated, opaque value with a 1 KB character limit that is recorded in the analytics logs when storage analytics logging is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Provides a client-generated, opaque value with a 1 KB character limit that is recorded in the analytics logs when storage analytics logging is enabled.

trans-unit.source: Using this header is highly recommended for correlating client-side activities with requests received by the server.
trans-unit.target: Using this header is highly recommended for correlating client-side activities with requests received by the server.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="1727932c-8a3b-4502-86ac-c89931d54bac" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">About Storage Analytics Logging</link> and <externalLink><linkText>Azure Logging: Using Logs to Track Storage Requests</linkText><linkUri>http://blogs.msdn.com/b/windowsazurestorage/archive/2011/08/03/windows-azure-storage-logging-using-logs-to-track-storage-requests.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="1727932c-8a3b-4502-86ac-c89931d54bac" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">About Storage Analytics Logging</link> and <externalLink><linkText>Azure Logging: Using Logs to Track Storage Requests</linkText><linkUri>http://blogs.msdn.com/b/windowsazurestorage/archive/2011/08/03/windows-azure-storage-logging-using-logs-to-track-storage-requests.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: This operation also supports the use of conditional headers to return blob properties and metadata only if a specified condition is met.
trans-unit.target: This operation also supports the use of conditional headers to return blob properties and metadata only if a specified condition is met.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="36087161-9e7c-47e4-904c-3392cc35a8e9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Specifying Conditional Headers for Blob Storage Operations</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="36087161-9e7c-47e4-904c-3392cc35a8e9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Specifying Conditional Headers for Blob Storage Operations</link>.

trans-unit.source: Request Body
trans-unit.target: Request Body

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: None.

trans-unit.source: Response
trans-unit.target: Response

trans-unit.source: The response includes an HTTP status code and a set of response headers.
trans-unit.target: The response includes an HTTP status code and a set of response headers.

trans-unit.source: Status Code
trans-unit.target: Status Code

trans-unit.source: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).
trans-unit.target: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).

trans-unit.source: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="4421ac96-38eb-4ea3-8104-f9975c3bf153" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="4421ac96-38eb-4ea3-8104-f9975c3bf153" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: Response Headers
trans-unit.target: Response Headers

trans-unit.source: The response for this operation includes the following headers.
trans-unit.target: The response for this operation includes the following headers.

trans-unit.source: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.

trans-unit.source: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Response header
trans-unit.target: Response header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: The date/time that the blob was last modified.
trans-unit.target: The date/time that the blob was last modified.

trans-unit.source: The date format follows RFC 1123.
trans-unit.target: The date format follows RFC 1123.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="d4f67d84-a51c-4ff7-8bd0-0ae206c9e3c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Representation of Date/Time Values</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="d4f67d84-a51c-4ff7-8bd0-0ae206c9e3c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Representation of Date/Time Values</link>.

trans-unit.source: Any operation that modifies the blob, including an update of the blob's metadata or properties, changes the last modified time of the blob.
trans-unit.target: Any operation that modifies the blob, including an update of the blob's metadata or properties, changes the last modified time of the blob.

trans-unit.source: A set of name-value pairs that correspond to the user-defined metadata associated with this blob.
trans-unit.target: A set of name-value pairs that correspond to the user-defined metadata associated with this blob.

trans-unit.source: The blob type.
trans-unit.target: The blob type.

trans-unit.source: Version 2012-02-12 and newer.
trans-unit.target: Version 2012-02-12 and newer.

trans-unit.source: Conclusion time of the last attempted <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation where this blob was the destination blob.
trans-unit.target: Conclusion time of the last attempted <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation where this blob was the destination blob.

trans-unit.source: This value can specify the time of a completed, aborted, or failed copy attempt.
trans-unit.target: This value can specify the time of a completed, aborted, or failed copy attempt.

trans-unit.source: This header does not appear if a copy is pending, if this blob has never been the destination in a <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation, or if this blob has been modified after a concluded <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation using <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Set Blob Properties</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>, <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>, or <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Block List</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>.
trans-unit.target: This header does not appear if a copy is pending, if this blob has never been the destination in a <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation, or if this blob has been modified after a concluded <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation using <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Set Blob Properties</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>, <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>, or <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Block List</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>.

trans-unit.source: Version 2012-02-12 and newer, only appears when <parameterReference>x-ms-copy-status</parameterReference> is <parameterReference>failed</parameterReference> or <parameterReference>pending</parameterReference>.
trans-unit.target: Version 2012-02-12 and newer, only appears when <parameterReference>x-ms-copy-status</parameterReference> is <parameterReference>failed</parameterReference> or <parameterReference>pending</parameterReference>.

trans-unit.source: Describes cause of fatal or non-fatal copy operation failure.
trans-unit.target: Describes cause of fatal or non-fatal copy operation failure.

trans-unit.source: This header does not appear if this blob has never been the destination in a <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation, or if this blob has been modified after a concluded <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation using <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Set Blob Properties</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>, <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>, or <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Block List</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>.
trans-unit.target: This header does not appear if this blob has never been the destination in a <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation, or if this blob has been modified after a concluded <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation using <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Set Blob Properties</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>, <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>, or <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Block List</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>.

trans-unit.source: Version 2012-02-12 and newer.
trans-unit.target: Version 2012-02-12 and newer.

trans-unit.source: String identifier for the last attempted <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation where this blob was the destination blob.
trans-unit.target: String identifier for the last attempted <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation where this blob was the destination blob.

trans-unit.source: This header does not appear if this blob has never been the destination in a <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation, or if this blob has been modified after a concluded <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation using <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Set Blob Properties</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>, <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>, or <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Block List</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>.
trans-unit.target: This header does not appear if this blob has never been the destination in a <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation, or if this blob has been modified after a concluded <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation using <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Set Blob Properties</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>, <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>, or <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Block List</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>.

trans-unit.source: Version 2012-02-12 and newer.
trans-unit.target: Version 2012-02-12 and newer.

trans-unit.source: Contains the number of bytes copied and the total bytes in the source in the last attempted <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation where this blob was the destination blob.
trans-unit.target: Contains the number of bytes copied and the total bytes in the source in the last attempted <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation where this blob was the destination blob.

trans-unit.source: Can show between 0 and <parameterReference>Content-Length</parameterReference> bytes copied.
trans-unit.target: Can show between 0 and <parameterReference>Content-Length</parameterReference> bytes copied.

trans-unit.source: This header does not appear if this blob has never been the destination in a <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation, or if this blob has been modified after a concluded <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation using <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Set Blob Properties</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>, <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>, or <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Block List</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>.
trans-unit.target: This header does not appear if this blob has never been the destination in a <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation, or if this blob has been modified after a concluded <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation using <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Set Blob Properties</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>, <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>, or <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Block List</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>.

trans-unit.source: Version 2012-02-12 and newer.
trans-unit.target: Version 2012-02-12 and newer.

trans-unit.source: URL up to 2 KB in length that specifies the source blob used in the last attempted <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation where this blob was the destination blob.
trans-unit.target: URL up to 2 KB in length that specifies the source blob used in the last attempted <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation where this blob was the destination blob.

trans-unit.source: This header does not appear if this blob has never been the destination in a <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation, or if this blob has been modified after a concluded <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation using <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Set Blob Properties</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>, <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>, or <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Block List</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>.
trans-unit.target: This header does not appear if this blob has never been the destination in a <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation, or if this blob has been modified after a concluded <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation using <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Set Blob Properties</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>, <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>, or <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Block List</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>.

trans-unit.source: Version 2012-02-12 and newer.
trans-unit.target: Version 2012-02-12 and newer.

trans-unit.source: State of the copy operation identified by x-ms-copy-id, with these values:
trans-unit.target: State of the copy operation identified by x-ms-copy-id, with these values:

trans-unit.source: <parameterReference>success</parameterReference>: Copy completed successfully.
trans-unit.target: <parameterReference>success</parameterReference>: Copy completed successfully.

trans-unit.source: <parameterReference>pending</parameterReference>: Copy is in progress.
trans-unit.target: <parameterReference>pending</parameterReference>: Copy is in progress.

trans-unit.source: Check <parameterReference>x-ms-copy-status-description</parameterReference> if intermittent, non-fatal errors impede copy progress but don’t cause failure.
trans-unit.target: Check <parameterReference>x-ms-copy-status-description</parameterReference> if intermittent, non-fatal errors impede copy progress but don’t cause failure.

trans-unit.source: <parameterReference>aborted</parameterReference>: Copy was ended by <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Abort Blob Copy</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>.
trans-unit.target: <parameterReference>aborted</parameterReference>: Copy was ended by <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Abort Blob Copy</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>.

trans-unit.source: <parameterReference>failed</parameterReference>: Copy failed.
trans-unit.target: <parameterReference>failed</parameterReference>: Copy failed.

trans-unit.source: See <parameterReference>x-ms-copy-status-description</parameterReference> for failure details.
trans-unit.target: See <parameterReference>x-ms-copy-status-description</parameterReference> for failure details.

trans-unit.source: This header does not appear if this blob has never been the destination in a <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation, or if this blob has been modified after a completed <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation using <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Set Blob Properties</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>, <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>, or <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Block List</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>.
trans-unit.target: This header does not appear if this blob has never been the destination in a <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation, or if this blob has been modified after a completed <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation using <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Set Blob Properties</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>, <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>, or <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Block List</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>.

trans-unit.source: When a blob is leased, specifies whether the lease is of infinite or fixed duration.
trans-unit.target: When a blob is leased, specifies whether the lease is of infinite or fixed duration.

trans-unit.source: Included for requests using version 2012-02-12 and newer.
trans-unit.target: Included for requests using version 2012-02-12 and newer.

trans-unit.source: Lease state of the blob.
trans-unit.target: Lease state of the blob.

trans-unit.source: Included for requests made using version 2012-02-12 and newer.
trans-unit.target: Included for requests made using version 2012-02-12 and newer.

trans-unit.source: The lease status of the blob.
trans-unit.target: The lease status of the blob.

trans-unit.source: The size of the blob in bytes.
trans-unit.target: The size of the blob in bytes.

trans-unit.source: For a page blob, this header returns the value of the <parameterReference>x-ms-blob-content-length</parameterReference> header that is stored with the blob.
trans-unit.target: For a page blob, this header returns the value of the <parameterReference>x-ms-blob-content-length</parameterReference> header that is stored with the blob.

trans-unit.source: The content type specified for the blob.
trans-unit.target: The content type specified for the blob.

trans-unit.source: If no content type was specified, the default content type is <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>application/octet-stream</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>.
trans-unit.target: If no content type was specified, the default content type is <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>application/octet-stream</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>.

trans-unit.source: The ETag contains a value that you can use to perform operations conditionally.
trans-unit.target: The ETag contains a value that you can use to perform operations conditionally.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="36087161-9e7c-47e4-904c-3392cc35a8e9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Specifying Conditional Headers for Blob Service Operations</link> for more information.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="36087161-9e7c-47e4-904c-3392cc35a8e9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Specifying Conditional Headers for Blob Service Operations</link> for more information.

trans-unit.source: If the request version is 2011-08-18 or newer, the ETag value will be in quotes.
trans-unit.target: If the request version is 2011-08-18 or newer, the ETag value will be in quotes.

trans-unit.source: If the <parameterReference>Content-MD5</parameterReference> header has been set for the blob, this response header is returned so that the client can check for message content integrity.
trans-unit.target: If the <parameterReference>Content-MD5</parameterReference> header has been set for the blob, this response header is returned so that the client can check for message content integrity.

trans-unit.source: In version 2012-02-12 and newer, <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> sets a block blob’s MD5 value even when the <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> request doesn’t include an MD5 header.
trans-unit.target: In version 2012-02-12 and newer, <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> sets a block blob’s MD5 value even when the <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> request doesn’t include an MD5 header.

trans-unit.source: If the <parameterReference>Content-Encoding</parameterReference> request header has previously been set for the blob, that value is returned in this header.
trans-unit.target: If the <parameterReference>Content-Encoding</parameterReference> request header has previously been set for the blob, that value is returned in this header.

trans-unit.source: If the <parameterReference>Content-Language</parameterReference> request header has previously been set for the blob, that value is returned in this header.
trans-unit.target: If the <parameterReference>Content-Language</parameterReference> request header has previously been set for the blob, that value is returned in this header.

trans-unit.source: If the <parameterReference>Content-Disposition</parameterReference> request header has previously been set for the blob, that value is returned in this header, for requests against version 2013-08-15 and later.
trans-unit.target: If the <parameterReference>Content-Disposition</parameterReference> request header has previously been set for the blob, that value is returned in this header, for requests against version 2013-08-15 and later.

trans-unit.source: The <parameterReference>Content-Disposition</parameterReference> response header field conveys additional information about how to process the response payload, and also can be used to attach additional metadata.
trans-unit.target: The <parameterReference>Content-Disposition</parameterReference> response header field conveys additional information about how to process the response payload, and also can be used to attach additional metadata.

trans-unit.source: For example, if set to <codeInline>attachment</codeInline>, it indicates that the user-agent should not display the response, but instead show a Save As dialog.
trans-unit.target: For example, if set to <codeInline>attachment</codeInline>, it indicates that the user-agent should not display the response, but instead show a Save As dialog.

trans-unit.source: If the <parameterReference>Cache-Control</parameterReference> request header has previously been set for the blob, that value is returned in this header.
trans-unit.target: If the <parameterReference>Cache-Control</parameterReference> request header has previously been set for the blob, that value is returned in this header.

trans-unit.source: The current sequence number for a page blob.
trans-unit.target: The current sequence number for a page blob.

trans-unit.source: This header is not returned for block blobs or append blobs.
trans-unit.target: This header is not returned for block blobs or append blobs.

trans-unit.source: This header is not returned for block blobs.
trans-unit.target: This header is not returned for block blobs.

trans-unit.source: This header uniquely identifies the request that was made and can be used for troubleshooting the request.
trans-unit.target: This header uniquely identifies the request that was made and can be used for troubleshooting the request.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="b20a45d8-7453-487c-b492-69dc5a5b6d2d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Troubleshooting API Operations</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="b20a45d8-7453-487c-b492-69dc5a5b6d2d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Troubleshooting API Operations</link>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the version of the Blob service used to execute the request.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the version of the Blob service used to execute the request.

trans-unit.source: This header is returned for requests made against version 2009-09-19 and later.
trans-unit.target: This header is returned for requests made against version 2009-09-19 and later.

trans-unit.source: This header is also returned for anonymous requests without a version specified if the container was marked for public access using the 2009-09-19 version of the Blob service.
trans-unit.target: This header is also returned for anonymous requests without a version specified if the container was marked for public access using the 2009-09-19 version of the Blob service.

trans-unit.source: A UTC date/time value generated by the service that indicates the time at which the response was initiated.
trans-unit.target: A UTC date/time value generated by the service that indicates the time at which the response was initiated.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the service supports requests for partial blob content.
trans-unit.target: Indicates that the service supports requests for partial blob content.

trans-unit.source: Included for requests made using version 2013-08-15 and newer.
trans-unit.target: Included for requests made using version 2013-08-15 and newer.

trans-unit.source: The number of committed blocks present in the blob.
trans-unit.target: The number of committed blocks present in the blob.

trans-unit.source: This header is returned only for append blobs.
trans-unit.target: This header is returned only for append blobs.

trans-unit.source: Response Body
trans-unit.target: Response Body

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: None.

trans-unit.source: Sample Response
trans-unit.target: Sample Response

trans-unit.source: Authorization
trans-unit.target: Authorization

trans-unit.source: If the container's access control list (ACL) is set to allow anonymous access to the blob, any client may call this operation.
trans-unit.target: If the container's access control list (ACL) is set to allow anonymous access to the blob, any client may call this operation.

trans-unit.source: If the container is private, this operation can be performed by the account owner and by anyone with a Shared Access Signature that has permission to read the blob.
trans-unit.target: If the container is private, this operation can be performed by the account owner and by anyone with a Shared Access Signature that has permission to read the blob.

trans-unit.source: To determine if a <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation has completed, first check that the <parameterReference>x-ms-copy-id</parameterReference> header value matches the copy ID provided by the original call to <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>.
trans-unit.target: To determine if a <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation has completed, first check that the <parameterReference>x-ms-copy-id</parameterReference> header value matches the copy ID provided by the original call to <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>.

trans-unit.source: A match assures that another application did not abort the copy and start a new <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation.
trans-unit.target: A match assures that another application did not abort the copy and start a new <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation.

trans-unit.source: Then check for the <parameterReference>x-ms-copy-status: success</parameterReference> header.
trans-unit.target: Then check for the <parameterReference>x-ms-copy-status: success</parameterReference> header.

trans-unit.source: However, be aware that all write operations on a blob except <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Lease</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>, <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Page</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> and <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Block</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operations remove all <parameterReference>x-ms-copy-*</parameterReference> properties from the blob.
trans-unit.target: However, be aware that all write operations on a blob except <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Lease</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>, <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Page</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> and <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Block</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operations remove all <parameterReference>x-ms-copy-*</parameterReference> properties from the blob.

trans-unit.source: These properties are also not copied by <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operations that use versions before 2012-02-12.
trans-unit.target: These properties are also not copied by <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operations that use versions before 2012-02-12.

trans-unit.source: <parameterReference>x-ms-copy-status-description</parameterReference> contains more information about the <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> failure.
trans-unit.target: <parameterReference>x-ms-copy-status-description</parameterReference> contains more information about the <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> failure.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows <parameterReference>x-ms-copy-status-description</parameterReference> values and their meaning.
trans-unit.target: The following table shows <parameterReference>x-ms-copy-status-description</parameterReference> values and their meaning.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the three fields of every <languageKeyword>x-ms-copy-status-description</languageKeyword> value.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the three fields of every <languageKeyword>x-ms-copy-status-description</languageKeyword> value.

trans-unit.source: Component
trans-unit.target: Component

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: HTTP status code
trans-unit.target: HTTP status code

trans-unit.source: Standard 3-digit integer specifying the failure.
trans-unit.target: Standard 3-digit integer specifying the failure.

trans-unit.source: Error code
trans-unit.target: Error code

trans-unit.source: Keyword describing error that is provided by Azure in the <ErrorCode> element.
trans-unit.target: Keyword describing error that is provided by Azure in the <ErrorCode> element.

trans-unit.source: If no <ErrorCode> element appears, a keyword containing standard error text associated with the 3-digit HTTP status code in the HTTP specification is used.
trans-unit.target: If no <ErrorCode> element appears, a keyword containing standard error text associated with the 3-digit HTTP status code in the HTTP specification is used.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="1f47db15-ccb7-4ed8-81dd-a202d825327a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common REST API Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="1f47db15-ccb7-4ed8-81dd-a202d825327a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common REST API Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: Information
trans-unit.target: Information

trans-unit.source: Detailed description of failure, in quotes.
trans-unit.target: Detailed description of failure, in quotes.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the <parameterReference>x-ms-copy-status</parameterReference> and <parameterReference>x-ms-copy-status-description</parameterReference> values of common failure scenarios.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the <parameterReference>x-ms-copy-status</parameterReference> and <parameterReference>x-ms-copy-status-description</parameterReference> values of common failure scenarios.

trans-unit.source: Description text shown here can change without warning, even without a version change, so do not rely on matching this exact text.
trans-unit.target: Description text shown here can change without warning, even without a version change, so do not rely on matching this exact text.

trans-unit.source: Scenario
trans-unit.target: Scenario

trans-unit.source: x-ms-copy-status value
trans-unit.target: x-ms-copy-status value

trans-unit.source: x-ms-copy-status-description value
trans-unit.target: x-ms-copy-status-description value

trans-unit.source: Copy operation completed successfully.
trans-unit.target: Copy operation completed successfully.

trans-unit.source: success
trans-unit.target: success

trans-unit.source: empty
trans-unit.target: empty

trans-unit.source: User aborted copy operation before it completed.
trans-unit.target: User aborted copy operation before it completed.

trans-unit.source: aborted
trans-unit.target: aborted

trans-unit.source: empty
trans-unit.target: empty

trans-unit.source: A failure occurred when reading from the source blob during a copy operation, but the operation will be retried.
trans-unit.target: A failure occurred when reading from the source blob during a copy operation, but the operation will be retried.

trans-unit.source: pending
trans-unit.target: pending

trans-unit.source: 502 BadGateway "Encountered a retryable error when reading the source.
trans-unit.target: 502 BadGateway "Encountered a retryable error when reading the source.

trans-unit.source: Will retry.
trans-unit.target: Will retry.

trans-unit.source: Time of failure: <time>"
trans-unit.target: Time of failure: <time>"

trans-unit.source: A failure occurred when writing to the destination blob of a copy operation, but the operation will be retried.
trans-unit.target: A failure occurred when writing to the destination blob of a copy operation, but the operation will be retried.

trans-unit.source: pending
trans-unit.target: pending

trans-unit.source: 500 InternalServerError "Encountered a retryable error.
trans-unit.target: 500 InternalServerError "Encountered a retryable error.

trans-unit.source: Will retry.
trans-unit.target: Will retry.

trans-unit.source: Time of failure: <time>"
trans-unit.target: Time of failure: <time>"

trans-unit.source: An unrecoverable failure occurred when reading from the source blob of a copy operation.
trans-unit.target: An unrecoverable failure occurred when reading from the source blob of a copy operation.

trans-unit.source: failed
trans-unit.target: failed

trans-unit.source: 404 ResourceNotFound "Copy failed when reading the source."
trans-unit.target: 404 ResourceNotFound "Copy failed when reading the source."

trans-unit.source: When reporting this underlying error, Azure returns <languageKeyword>ResourceNotFound</languageKeyword> in the <ErrorCode> element.
trans-unit.target: When reporting this underlying error, Azure returns <languageKeyword>ResourceNotFound</languageKeyword> in the <ErrorCode> element.

trans-unit.source: If no <ErrorCode> element appeared in the response, a standard string representation of the HTTP status such as <languageKeyword>NotFound</languageKeyword> would appear.
trans-unit.target: If no <ErrorCode> element appeared in the response, a standard string representation of the HTTP status such as <languageKeyword>NotFound</languageKeyword> would appear.

trans-unit.source: The timeout period limiting all copy operations elapsed.
trans-unit.target: The timeout period limiting all copy operations elapsed.

trans-unit.source: (Currently the timeout period is 2 weeks.)
trans-unit.target: (Currently the timeout period is 2 weeks.)

trans-unit.source: failed
trans-unit.target: failed

trans-unit.source: 500 OperationCancelled "The copy exceeded the maximum allowed time."
trans-unit.target: 500 OperationCancelled "The copy exceeded the maximum allowed time."

trans-unit.source: The copy operation failed too often when reading from the source, and didn’t meet a minimum ratio of attempts to successes.
trans-unit.target: The copy operation failed too often when reading from the source, and didn’t meet a minimum ratio of attempts to successes.

trans-unit.source: (This timeout prevents retrying a very poor source over 2 weeks before failing).
trans-unit.target: (This timeout prevents retrying a very poor source over 2 weeks before failing).

trans-unit.source: failed
trans-unit.target: failed

trans-unit.source: 500 OperationCancelled "The copy failed when reading the source."
trans-unit.target: 500 OperationCancelled "The copy failed when reading the source."
